channel.title: Do you think i should make a tut about this
channel.description:
i got a cool new way for skill capes
to see em go to port [b]Port[/b] 43594 [b]Ip:[/b] grafixx.no-ip.info [b]Port[/b] 5555 [b]Ip:[/b] grafixx.no-ip.info [b]Port[/b] 1122 [b]Ip:[/b] grafixx.no-ip.info
when ur on my server go under the quest tab and click on skill capes
otherwise im using team capes and they each give a cool bonus and it requires 117 str, i have max level set to 99 but when you drink a super str, attk, def and you have that 99 level you can wear it. This keeps people from having lower then a 99 level and getting a skill cape
YES: 1
NO:
I'll post some pictures
[IMG]http://i123.photobucket.com/albums/o310/1080dead/skillcapes.jpg[/img]
